parts.text: What are the important topics to focus on while preparing for the NEET exam in Biology?

responses.text: Key topics include Human Physiology, Plant Physiology, Genetics and Evolution, Ecology and Environment, Cell Biology, and Biotechnology.

parts.text: What are the key topics in Chemistry for NEET preparation?

responses.text: Important areas are Physical Chemistry (stoichiometry, thermodynamics), Organic Chemistry (functional groups, reactions), Inorganic Chemistry (periodic trends), and Equilibrium (acid-base equilibrium).
